oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Monuments in Snodgrass Hill, General Thomas Batteline, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of cannons and monuments on Snodgrass Hill in Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. The postcard mentions Chattanooga, Tennessee but Snodgrass Hill is located on the Chickamauga, Georgia side of the park. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. Postcard made in Germany. [No. 53388]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Cannons; Hills
